hero.headline: Rooted in Tradition. Growing with Purpose.
hero.subheadline: Locally Strong empowers small businesses, farmers, and producers by strengthening local communities through collaboration, education, and thoughtful innovation.

items.description: Building networks between farmers, vendors, and communities
Providing resources, education, and support for small businesses
Creating lasting economic resilience in local food systems

programs.headline: Our Programs
programs.subheadline: Strengthening local food systems through focused initiatives

items.quote: Locally Strong helped us grow from a small farm stand to a thriving business with multiple market locations.
items.author: Sarah Chen

items.quote: The mentorship program gave me the confidence and skills to launch my own prepared foods business.
items.author: Marcus Williams

items.quote: Being part of this network means we're never alone. There's always someone to help troubleshoot or share resources.
items.author: Elena Rodriguez
